Package ohos.global.resource.solidxml

Class Pattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.resource.solidxml.Pattern

  • public abstract class Pattern
extends Object
    Provides resource attributes for a specific pattern.

    A hash map returned by Pattern#getPatternHash stores the pattern attributes. You can call Element.getPattern() to obtain the Pattern instance based on the resource ID.

    Since:
    3

        public Pattern​()

    • Method Detail

      • getPatternHash

        public abstract HashMap<String,TypedAttribute> getPatternHash​()
        Obtains the hash map of this Pattern. The hash map stores the pattern attributes, containing the pattern names as keys and associated TypedAttribute as values.
        Returns:
        Returns the hash map of this Pattern.
        Since:
        3

      • getCombinedPattern

        public abstract Pattern getCombinedPattern​(Pattern child)
        Obtains a combined pattern formed by this Pattern and another pattern, which will act as a child pattern.

        The attributes of the child pattern will overwrite those of this Pattern.

        Parameters:
        child - Indicates the child pattern.
        Returns:
        Returns the combined pattern.
        Since:
        3

      • set

        public abstract void set​(Pattern pattern)
        Sets this Pattern to hold all the attribute values of an existing Pattern instance.
        Parameters:
        pattern - Indicates the Pattern instance whose attribute values are to be assigned to this Pattern.
        Since:
        4

      • getPatternHash

        public abstract HashMap<String,TypedAttribute> getPatternHash​(String[] selected)
        Obtains a hash map that contains selected attributes of this Pattern.
        Parameters:
        selected - Indicates the set of selected attribute names.
        Returns:
        Returns the hash map that contains selected attributes of this Pattern.
        Since:
        4
